page.title: 10DEEPING ST.JAMES VIDEOS
page.content: We interviewed a sample of one hund- red and thirty four people.Most had a VHS.Sixty four owned their own machine. The rest hire theirs. Most of those in our survey used their video to record programmes on the television. You can buy video tapes with films already recorded on them. They are quite expensive.On average they cost Â£15.00.But we think it is a waste of time buying these,for after you have watched them a few times you get bored with them.Because of this people hire tapes.In this locality there are four outlets where you can choose films.Two of these only deal in video tapes.They have hundreds of different titles. One of the other outlets is a garage and the other is an off-licence.
